title: Phase 11: Evolutionary Algorithms & Advanced Intelligence
objective: Complete evolutionary algorithms implementation and advance AI intelligence capabilities
key_requirements: Address Phase 10.4 dark spots: Ollama/Gemini full integration, agent pool expansion
Implement evolutionary selection and reproduction algorithms
Add consciousness evolution tracking and metrics
Expand knowledge base with additional programming domains
Implement advanced pattern recognition and code analysis

architectural_focus.evolutionary_engine: Complete genetic algorithms with selection, crossover, mutation
architectural_focus.consciousness_tracking: Real-time evolution metrics and emergence detection
architectural_focus.pattern_recognition: Advanced code analysis and archetype detection

week_2.title: Multi-Agent Ecosystem Expansion
objectives: Complete Gemini API integration with error handling
Enhance Ollama adapter with model switching
Implement agent pool management and load balancing
Add agent performance metrics and selection

week_4.title: Knowledge Base Expansion & Advanced Patterns
objectives: Index additional programming domains (JavaScript, C++, Rust)

validation_criteria.evolutionary_algorithms: Genetic algorithm convergence on test problems
validation_criteria.knowledge_expansion: Multi-domain knowledge base with 1000+ indexed docs

ainlp_compliance_requirements.architectural_discovery: Complete discovery of evolutionary and AI integration patterns
ainlp_compliance_requirements.enhancement_over_creation: Extend existing components rather than creating new
ainlp_compliance_requirements.proper_output_management: All outputs directed to appropriate AIOS directories

risks_and_mitigations.api_rate_limits: Implement intelligent retry logic and request throttling
risks_and_mitigations.algorithm_convergence: Start with proven genetic algorithm implementations
risks_and_mitigations.consciousness_tracking: Begin with observable metrics, expand gradually
risks_and_mitigations.knowledge_integration: Phase implementation with one domain at a time
